Sri Mulyani Bersyal Batik Saat Evaluasi APBN 2019 Bareng DPR
04 Nov 2019, 09:15 by Lamhot Aritonang
 Jakarta - Menteri Keuangan (Menkeu) Sri Mulyani menghadiri rapat kerja perdana bersama Komisi XI DPR RI. Raker itu salah satunya membahas evaluasi kinerja APBN 2019.



Menteri Keuangan (Menkeu) Sri Mulyani Indrawati beserta jajaran Kementerian Keuangan menghadiri rapat kerja (raker) perdana bersama Komisi XI DPR di Kompleks Parlemen, Senayan, Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019).
 



Menkeu Sri Mulyani nampak mengenakan kemeja putih dan syal yang dililitkan di lehernya saat mengikuti raker perdana Komisi XI DPR RI.
 



Raker perdana ini membahas mengenai evaluasi kinerja APBN 2019. Selain itu, dalam raker ini juga dibahas rencana kerja APBN tahun anggaran 2020.
 



Selain memberikan pemaparan kinerja APBN 2019 dan rencana kerja APBN tahun anggaran 2020, Menkeu Sri Mulyani juga turut memberikan wejangan kepada para anggota baru Komisi XI DPR terkait ekonomi dunia.
 



Sri Mulyani kembali mengingatkan bahwa pelemahan ekonomi dunia akibat beberapa faktor yang tidak menentu perlu diwaspadai bersama antara pemerintah dan Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat (DPR).
 



Sri Mulyani menjabarkan pelemahan ekonomi dunia diproyeksi berada pada level 3% hingga akhir 2019. Menurutnya perubahan proyeksi yang ke arah penurunan dianggap berada pada level resesi. Penurunan tersebut dikarenakan oleh beberapa faktor salah satunya adalah perang dagang antara Amerika Serikat (AS) dengan China, dan Amerika Serikat dengan Eropa.

Sri Mulyani Says Batik when Evaluating the 2019 APBN Together with the DPR
04 Nov 2019, 09:15 by Lamhot Aritonang
Jakarta - Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani attended the inaugural working meeting with the House of Representatives Commission XI. The working meeting discussed one of them evaluating the performance of the 2019 APBN.



The Minister of Finance (Minister of Finance) Sri Mulyani Indrawati along with the Ministry of Finance attended the inaugural working meeting with the House of Representatives Commission XI at the Parliament Complex, Senayan, Jakarta, Monday (4/11/2019).




Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani appeared wearing a white shirt and a scarf wrapped around her neck while following the inaugural meeting of the House of Representatives Commission XI.




This inaugural meeting discussed the evaluation of the performance of the 2019 APBN. In addition, this meeting also discussed the APBN work plan for the 2020 fiscal year.




In addition to giving a presentation on the performance of the 2019 APBN and the APBN work plan for the 2020 fiscal year, Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani also gave advice to the new members of the DPR's Commission XI regarding the world economy.




Sri Mulyani reminded again that the weakening of the world economy due to several uncertain factors needed to be watched out jointly between the government and the House of Representatives (DPR).




Sri Mulyani explained that the weakening of the world economy is projected to be at the level of 3% until the end of 2019. According to him, the change in the projection towards the decline is considered to be at the level of recession. The decline was caused by several factors, one of which was a trade war between the United States (US) with China, and the United States and Europe.
